trans-unit.source: A flow content element that defines a row within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Table" />.
trans-unit.target: 定義 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Table" /> 內之資料列的非固定格式內容項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow" /> 類別的新的空執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableCellCollection" /> that contains cells of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableCellCollection" /> 之儲存格的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether or not the effective value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow.Cells" /> property should be serialized during serialization of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow.Cells" /> 屬性的有效值是否應該在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow" /> 物件的序列化期間序列化。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow.Cells" /> property should be serialized; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow.Cells" /> 屬性序列化，則為 **true**，否則為 **false**。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow.Cells" /> property to add child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell" /> elements to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow.Cells" /> 屬性，用以將子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell" /> 項目加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 將節點的文字內容加入物件中。
